properties.description: Slide which the view is focused on
properties.name: currentSlide

properties.description: Slides direction movement         Values: horizontal, vertical         Default: horizontal
properties.name: direction

properties.description: Nodes not allowed to act as sliders
properties.name: excludedSliders

properties.description: Denied slide by touching
properties.name: externalSlide

properties.description: Whether or not the swiper should have full screen mode
properties.name: fullScreen

properties.description: Initial displayed slide index
properties.name: initialSlide

properties.description: Maximum translate value allowed on pagination node
properties.name: maxPagingTranslation

properties.description: Maximum translate value allowed
properties.name: maxTranslation

properties.description: Minimum translate value allowed on pagination node
properties.name: minPagingTranslation

properties.description: Whether or not navigation buttons should be displayed
properties.name: navigation

properties.description: Pagination type         Values: filled, hideable         Default: filled
properties.name: pagination

properties.description: Quick access to the thumbnails container node
properties.name: pagingNode

properties.description: Prevent thumbnails selection on pagination shift
properties.name: selectElement

properties.description: Prevent thumbnails selection on pagination shift
properties.name: selectElement

properties.description: Slide size property depending on swiper direction
properties.name: sizeProperty

properties.description: Slide translate pixels amount for each pixel move by the mouse
properties.name: slideDistance

properties.description: Slides nodes and their translate ranges
properties.name: slides

properties.description: Slide size style property
properties.name: styleSizeProperty

properties.description: Translate pixels amount for each pixel move by the mouse on pagination node
properties.name: thumbnailDistance

properties.description: Thumbnails nodes and their translate ranges
properties.name: thumbnails

properties.description: Slide thumbnail size value
properties.name: thumbnailSize

properties.description: Swiper type         Values: slider, gallery         Default: slider
properties.name: type

properties.description: Quick access to the slides wrapper node
properties.name: wrapper

methods.description: Select thumbnail related to the current slide selected
methods.name: _activateThumbnail

methods.description: Whether or not slide process should be triggered
methods.name: _allowSlide

methods.description: Use internally when a slide is appended via html api
methods.name: _append

methods.description: Set up the full screen button handler
methods.name: _createFullScreenHandler

methods.description: Create and configure a new slide
methods.name: _createSlide

methods.description: Create and configure a new thumbnail
methods.name: _createThumbnail

methods.description: Create the dynamic thumbnail size style rule
methods.name: _createThumbStyle

methods.description: Decrease navigation button container considering pagination size
methods.name: _decreaseNavButtonHeight

methods.description: Get element computed style float property value
methods.name: _getNumProperty

params.description: Array or String value to be processed
params.name: value

methods.description: Hide navigation button on edge slides
methods.name: _hideNavBtn

methods.description: Whether or not the current position is related to an edge slide
methods.name: _isEdgeElement

methods.description: Proccess a position value and add the new distance to be translate to
methods.name: _proccesPosition

methods.description: Udpate the full screen handler button dimensions
methods.name: _resizeFullScreenHandler

methods.description: Activate or deactivate full screen mode
methods.name: _toggleFullScreen

methods.description: Move node a specified pixels distance
methods.name: _translate

methods.description: Update the dynamic thumbnail size style rule
methods.name: _updateThumbnailsSize

methods.description: Slide to the next slide element
methods.name: next

methods.description: Slide to the previous slide element
methods.name: prev

methods.description: Slide to the previous slide element
methods.name: slideTo
